page.title: 11Entertainment
page.content: The important social events in the year are; 1)the local agricultural show at Pantydwr held in August at which a team from Bwlchysarnau takes part in the rounders competition, and also in competitions at many shows in the surrounding area. 2)Pantydwr Eisteddfod in which the local Church choir competes. 3)Pantydwr&District Snooker Tournament held in the Autumn months with a large entry of all ages and both sexes. 4)Various church social functions and school entertainments throughout the year. There is also Coedsarnau Gunclub which runs clay pigeon shoots in the area. The two local pubs are Mid Wales Inn,Pantydwr and Happy Union,Abbeycwmhir which both have darts and dominoes teams.
